message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping we could come to a better agreement on the price. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand that $850000 is a good offer, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell it to you for $875000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $875000. I'm willing to pay $825000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
